title: More than 55 interpretations of seeing a dream about reading Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream and hearing it

preview.html: Interpretation and content of reading Al-Fatihah in a dream by senior scholarsReading the Qur’an in a dream is one of the important visions, and our article today on the specialized Egyptian website will talk about the interpretation of reading Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream, and what are the most prominent interpretations of respected jurists? Like Ibn Shaheen, Imam Al-Sadiq, Al-Nabulsi and others, through the following lines you will learn about the most important secrets of reciting Al-Fatihah in a dream.Reading Surat Al-Fatihah in a dreamThe interpretation of reading Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream symbolizes eight symbols: The first: Going to Hajj, which is one of the dearest wishes in the hearts of Muslims, Reading Surah Al-Fatihah to the dreamer in a dream is a sign that God will fulfill this desire for him and he will go to the Throne. The House of God is coming soon. Second: The dreamer who sees this vision in his dream is a person who often prays to God in his waking life to grant him some hope or goal, and this prayer will be answered soon. If he calls upon him to keep him away from the evil of corruptors, he will find that his life has already become peaceful. And free from evil, and if he calls him to restore his health and well-being and keep him away from it. The evil of illness will come true, knowing that the invitation that the dreamer made may be for one of his family members, and the dream promises that she will respond as well. Third: Whoever lived a difficult and bitter life and dreamed of reciting Surat Al-Fatihah in his dream, he will soon find victory and solace in his life. For example Example, a dreamer who fails his exams and fails again and again in his waking life, and this causes him great sadness, then his studies will be facilitated and he will no longer fail, but his sorrows will turn into joys and success will knock on him. His door will soon come, and the divine scribe who complains about the hardships of his profession will find comfort and kindness in the coming days. Fourth: Skill in livelihood will be the share of the married, the married, the unmarried, and the unmarried, and every dreamer sees that he is reading Surah Al-Fatihah in a dream. Fifth: The cover is one of the most powerful divine blessings that he gives. Merciful to His servants, and the dreamer who reads Surah Al-Fatihah in his dream, God grants him and covers his money, health, children, and private life, including social ones. And family, career, and other relationships. Sixth: Among the implications of this vision, which sparked controversy among many dreamers, is that our teacher Abu Bakr Al-Siddiq explained this vision and said that the man who recites Surah Al-Fatihah will have the share of marrying seven women during the entire period. In his life. Note that it is not permissible for him to marry them both because Sharia law allows a man to have only four wives. This means that he can marry and then divorce a number of them or remarry after a while. The woman dies, and therefore the life circumstances that make him marry many women will raise their number to seven. Seven: As for our teacher Omar bin Al-Khattab, he indicated a special interpretation of this vision and said that the dreamer who memorized the Qur’an of his Lord and the teachings of his religion and was in a state of wakefulness was sick and struggling with the pain of illness. He saw that he recited that Surah in his dream, so his time would end and he would go to his Lord so that he would be rewarded for the good deeds that he insisted on in his life. Eighth: Surah Al-Fatihah in a dream contains relief.

The woman dies, and therefore the life circumstances that make him marry many women will raise their number to seven. Seven: As for our teacher Omar bin Al-Khattab, he indicated a special interpretation of this vision and said that the dreamer who memorized the Qur’an of his Lord and the teachings of his religion and was in a state of wakefulness was sick and struggling with the pain of illness. He saw that he recited that Surah in his dream, so his time would end and he would go to his Lord so that he would be rewarded for the good deeds that he insisted on in his life. Eighth: Surah Al-Fatihah in a dream contains relief.

title: Interpretation of a dream about wearing an abaya and its implications

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about wearing the abaya in a dream: There are many women and girls who are forced to wear the abaya when they leave the house. We know that it is the closest to the legal dress, and there is also the abaya for men who wear it many times, and the general clothing in the dream, if it were new, heralds the dreamer of good meanings and good things to come. As for the abaya, we will learn about the abaya in the article. Interpretation of a dream about wearing an abaya in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about an abaya for a single woman. The abaya in an unmarried woman’s dream is a sign of covering and an indication of the dreamer’s commitment to Islamic teachings and law and staying away from everything that angers God Almighty. The abaya in a dream indicates that the dreamer She is going through positive changes in her life. Wearing a white abaya means her marriage is approaching. A white abaya in a dream for an unmarried woman means a good man. Seeing unmarried women buying a new abaya means that they will receive great benefit. The dream also means that it improves the dreamer’s circumstances in all aspects. The abaya In a dream, it also means that the dreamer will receive material gains. The vision also indicates an improvement in the social status of the bachelor. The vision also means that the dreamer has a new job opportunity. The vision indicates that the dreamer will call soon. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing someone burning in a dream. The abaya in A dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that dreaming of an abaya in a dream means different interpretations that vary depending on the dreamer’s condition. We explain to you below in detail the interpretation of a dream about an abaya in a dream by Ibn Sirin: A colored abaya in a dream is better than a black abaya. An abaya soaked in water can warn the dreamer that his trip will be disrupted. Or it may mean that the dreamer will suffer from anxiety and problems. A dirty abaya in a dream portends the dreamer’s illness. Wearing A loose abaya means a spacious life and better conditions for the dreamer. The interpretation of a dream about an abaya in a dream for a single woman differs from that for a married woman. The majority of interpretations related to seeing an abaya in a dream are good. See also: Interpretation of a dream when you see someone shouting at you in a dream Interpretation of a dream about clothes A black abaya for women If an unmarried woman sees In a dream that she is wearing a black abaya, this is not usually an indication of unwanted things happening, but it is often beneficial for her, and what is the interpretation of the dream of wearing a black abaya for? A single woman indicates that the woman is as follows: The black abaya in a woman’s dream indicates Unmarried women rise to a high status. Imam Nabulsi also considered that the black abaya for unmarried women is the highest status and reputation for a woman. Ibn Sirin says that if the black abaya is not mixed with another color, it means the dreamer’s new job. The black abaya also in the dream of unmarried people means halal money and food. And abundance. See also: Interpretation of a dream about drinking anise in a dream Interpretation of a dream about an abaya for a pregnant woman Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream wearing an abaya and she was beautiful means happiness that awaits the dreamer. The vision also shows that the day the dreamer was born

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing red clothes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams by seeing red clothes in a dream in detail, as the red color is considered one of the most attractive colors as it attracts attention and is one of the fiery colors that symbolize feelings and love. The dream has many connotations and meanings that we will learn about today in our article, we also discover the most important details of red clothes in a dream, which differ from one person to another, so we will provide you with an interpretation of the dream of the vision. Red clothes in a dream for a single man, pregnant, married. Interpretation of a dream about seeing red clothes by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of dreams about seeing red clothes, especially in a woman's dream, is evidence of effort and progress towards achieving her goals and aspirations. Seeing an unmarried woman wearing this red dress is a sign that she will get married soon. Interpretation of a dream about red clothes for single women In general, the red color in the clothes of an unmarried girl carries a sign indicating her brilliance and distinction, as it is a symbol of positive energy. Seeing an unmarried girl wearing a red dress in a dream means that she is going through a severe emotional state in reality. Also, the red coat in a dream indicates warm feelings, especially if this coat is made of wool. Also, red clothes in a dream for unmarried women are evidence that they will become innovative and have a lot of creativity in their studies and sciences, and it also symbolizes their sharp intelligence and great ambition. The red dress for a single woman in a dream indicates that she has soft powers that affect those around her in a strange way, and it is a moral force such as attraction and charm. Seeing red clothes in a dream for a single girl is evidence that she loves to keep up with fashion and look good Always. Interpretation of a dream about red clothes for a married woman The red color for a married woman indicates good luck, abundance of money, livelihood and kindness. As for seeing a woman in red clothes, this is evidence of the extent of harmony and love between her and her husband. A married woman who sees herself wearing a short red dress, this dream is hated for her because it actually indicates disagreements and problems between family and relatives. Seeing a red coat, pants, shirt, socks and shoes in a dream means that there is a lot of food and money for them. Interpretation of a dream about red clothes for a pregnant woman Seeing red clothes in a pregnant woman's dream indicates an abundance of wealth and goodness. Seeing a sick pregnant woman in a red dress in a dream is evidence of the death of this disease, fatigue, recovery and enjoyment of health. Also, seeing a red dress indicates the birth of a girl in reality, as the red color is a sign of femininity. Interpretation of a dream about red clothes for a man If you see a red coat in a man's dream, this means that he suffers from many problems and concerns. As for seeing red pants in a dream, it shows the amount of time and money wasted on trivial things. Likewise, seeing a red shirt in a dream indicates a lot of fun and games that the fortune teller does And wasting money on things that God has forbidden. The red dress in a man’s dream is evidence of many things.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing anger in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html:
Anger in a dream: Many people always wonder about seeing anger in a dream, as it is one of the strange visions that is widespread and has many meanings and connections between its aspects. Anger in a dream Seeing anger in a dream strongly leads the dreamer to suffer from some sorrows and worries, and when one sees that he was angry and cried loudly High in his dream, this is evidence of crises and difficulties that the viewer faces in his life, but soon God will save him from all of this and his conditions will improve. Seeing anger and screaming in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is suffering from some psychological problems, and when someone sees that he is angry in his dream, this is a sign of scandal. However, seeing extreme anger in a man’s dream is evidence that he is facing some health problems in the coming period. Anger and loud screaming in a dream indicate that the dreamer is feeling anxious, tense, and suffering from some psychological pressure in the current period, and seeing him screaming in a dream is evidence of an improvement in the dreamer’s condition and relieving him of his worries and sorrows. In his life. Al-Usaimi also interpreted seeing anger and screaming in a dream as evidence of all the material problems that the dreamer is suffering from and that he will gain more money and profits in the coming period, and shouting in a dream at someone leads to the end. Family disputes, and seeing intense anger is a sign of loss and loss. If a man sees anger in his dream and shouts at a specific person, this indicates the good and benefit that the dreamer will get from this person who is with him in the dream, but when a married woman sees that she is angry with the man in her The dream, and this leads to the end of all the marital problems that this woman suffers from in her life. Al-Nabulsi interpreted seeing anger in a dream as evidence that the dreamer is suffering from some psychological problems and depression at the present time. Ibn Shaheen also believes that seeing screaming and anger in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s lack of confidence and stability.
ZOE.When a person sees that he is angry and tears fall in a dream, this is evidence of the collapse of worries and diseases that the fortuneteller suffers from in his life, but screaming loudly in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of her suffering. Some health problems during pregnancy. Anger in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing anger and screaming in a dream with different explanations and interpretations, which are as follows: When a person sees anger in his dream, it leads to him suffering from some psychological problems and depression in the current period, and seeing anger and screaming in a dream is a sign. To improve the situation of the fortune teller and solve all crises and problems. He suffers in his life. When a person sees anger in his dream, this is one of the good visions that lead to gaining more goodness and benefits in the coming period. Seeing anger in a dream is evidence of the stress and tension that the viewer feels in the current period. Seeing anger at one’s parents in a dream is evidence of The dreamer soon faced some financial problems and losses in his life. Anger in a dream Fahd Al-Osaimi Fahd Al-Osaimi interpreted seeing anger in a dream as evidence of...

title: Interpretation of seeing illness in a dream

preview.html: If you are looking for an interpretation of seeing an illness in a dream, we are in an encyclopedia that will show you in detail the different situations that the dreamer can find in his dream. Illness is one of the things that not everyone prefers to see, whether it is found in the dream to be the patient, or if it is found by someone else. Health is one of the blessings that God has bestowed on man, and it is one of the greatest treasures that cannot be replaced by money or anything else. Therefore, seeing illness is one of the disturbing visions that the dreamer experiences and prompts him to search for a sure explanation for it. Therefore, in the following lines, we will show you the interpretation of seeing illness in a dream in detail, so follow us.Interpretation of seeing illness in a dream. Jurists have unanimously agreed that seeing illness in a dream, contrary to what some believe, is a sign of the health and strength of the body and cannot be a sign of illness in reality, but In some cases, seeing illness in a dream is a sign. Of the lies and deception in which the dreamer lives. It could be a sign that he is a deceitful person whose heart is full of hypocrisy. It could be a sign that he is exposed to the hypocrisy of those around him and he must be very careful. The jurists also said that seeing illness in a dream in some cases is a sign that the dreamer is in danger of lust and perhaps suspicion of those around him. Interpretation of seeing illness in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing a debtor or a person who is suffering from many crises as being sick in a dream, as evidence of... The comfort he will receive from God Almighty, because he will emerge from his crisis and go as if he had never been in the first place. location. Especially if he finds himself sick in a dream and dies. The scholar Ibn Sirin stated that seeing illness in a dream does not mean that it will happen in reality. But this does not bode well sometimes. If the dreamer finds in his dream that he is sick and leaves his house without saying a word, this is a sign of his approaching death, God forbid. In some cases, illness is evidence of the abundance of money that the fortuneteller will earn in the event that he falls ill with measles, and it may It is a sign that he will hear good news in the near future. Interpretation of fatigue in a dream for a single woman: Illness or fatigue in an unmarried girl’s dream is a sign that she is in good health in reality, and this dream is evidence of her beauty, and serious illness indicates that the dreamer has an emotional relationship with someone in reality. A fever in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of entering into a new relationship that may be an engagement or marriage in the near future, and God Almighty is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of illness in a dream for a married woman. A married woman’s recovery from illness, contrary to what some believe, indicates that she is living with a deceitful man who lies. On her and actually betray her. As for seeing illness in a married woman’s dream, it is a sign that she enjoys the love and devotion of her husband and that she will live a happy life and good health. Interpretation of illness in a pregnant woman’s dream: Contrary to what some people believe, illness in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence that she will have an easy and quick birth in the near future, God willing. God, she will be happy to see her healthy and sound child. In some cases, the disease is a sign of the gender of the fetus. a

title: Interpretation of a dream about a little boy according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a boy by Ibn Sirin: Seeing someone in a dream who is a young boy is a bad omen. A boy in a dream may indicate some problems that the dreamer will face. Whoever is in a misfortune and sees a boy in his dream, this is evidence of his salvation from these misfortunes in the near future. If one sees A boy in a dream and he is on his way to trade, he will lose his money. A young boy in a dream shows weakness and destruction. If one sees in a dream that he is carrying a boy, this is a sign of new jobs and abundant money. Interpretation of a dream about a boy from NabulsiSeeing a boy inside the house in a dream is a sign On distress, anxiety and troubles. If he can see inside the dream of a tall boy is a sign of the inheritance that this visionary will receive. Seeing a boy with long hair is a sign of malice, betrayal and hypocrisy of a friend. Anyone who dreams of a boy who quickly turns into a young man, this indicates kindness And nutrition. Buying a boy in a dream indicates distress and anxiety. Interpretation of seeing a boy for an unmarried woman. A boy in one dream indicates the problems she faces if she is engaged. A boy’s long hair in one dream indicates hatred and separation from his lover. If a girl is thinking about marriage and sees a boy In a dream, it means that she will get married soon. Interpretation of a boy’s dream for a man: Seeing a boy in a man’s dream is evidence that you will hear bad news. Seeing a boy with long hair in a man’s dream is evidence of exposure to some financial crises. Interpretation of a boy’s dream of a married woman: If he sees a married woman, the boy in the dream is evidence On many problems that she is going through. A boy in a married woman’s dream is evidence of her interest in some personal decisions. If she sees a boy with long hair, this indicates her husband’s betrayal of her. Interpretation of a dream of a boy for a pregnant woman: Seeing a baby in a dream is a bad omen. If a pregnant woman sees that she is giving birth A boy, then she will give birth to a girl. If she sees a blond boy in the dream, this is evidence that she will give birth to healthy twins and the birth will be easy. Add the dream you would like to interpret in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: I dreamed that I married Ibn Sirin again

preview.html: I dreamed that I married my husband again, marriage is a sacred bond that brings two people together to live their lives together in happiness, understanding, affection and mercy, and everyone who sees in her dream that she married her husband is surprised by this dream and rushes to search for the meanings and connotations related to it. To her for fear of harming or harming her, so we will explain in detail the explanations related to this topic in the following lines of the article. I dreamed that I married my husband again There are many interpretations mentioned by scholars in the vision of a woman marrying her husband, the most important of which are the following: If a woman sees in her dream that she has married her husband again, this is a sign of the many transformations that she will go through in her relationship with her partner, and the dream may turn into her ability to find solutions to the differences. And the quarrels that take place between them, and living with him in stability and happiness. Commentators also pointed out the wife's dream of marrying her partner again as a sign that God - Glory be to Him - will carry her in the near future. If the woman gives birth to a son at the age of marriage, this proves that the date of his marriage is approaching to a beautiful girl who will make him happy in his life. The dream of a woman marrying again symbolizes that she will receive a lot of good news or that her partner will earn a lot of money. The Secrets of Dream Interpretation website is a website specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world. Just type a site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. I dreamed that I married Ibn Sirin again. Know with us the various indications that were mentioned by the scholar Muhammad bin Sirin - may God have mercy on him - in the vision of a woman marrying again: Whoever sees in her dream that she will marry her husband, this will lead to joy and psychological comfort and following a wide diet that awaits him in the coming days. If a woman marries a man who is not her partner, who is attractive and elegant, this is a sign of the abundant good that God bestows upon her. And if the woman dreams that she is in a relationship with an unknown man, this A sign that she will hear completely unpleasant news, which may be a health problem or that she is facing a crisis that she cannot get out of. If a married woman sees that she is marrying a dead person, these worries and sorrows will prevent her from feeling peace, contentment and joy in her life. I dreamed that I married my husband to a married woman A woman's dream of marrying her partner symbolizes the renewal of the romantic relationship between them, even if she has children, and seeing herself again linked to her husband leads to her excelling in her studies and obtaining the highest academic degrees or a lot of money from a legitimate source. As the scholars of interpretation explained, whoever sees her marriage to her partner again in a dream, this is a sign of an improvement in her living conditions and that she is going with her husband to live in a new house that is better than before. I dreamed that I married my husband to a pregnant woman If the pregnant woman sees in her sleep that she is marrying her husband again according to the interpretation of Sheikh Al-Nabulsi and Imam Ibn Shaheen - may God have mercy on them - this vision indicates an easy birth by God's command and not feeling much fatigue and pain in the months of pregnancy and God relieves

title: A detailed interpretation of baldness in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of baldness in a dream is one of the dreams that does not bode well at all, because hair is one of the most important signs of beauty that a person seeks to take care of and take care of in order to preserve his health and safety. Beauty is throughout life, and this is for a man or a woman, both of whom consider hair the crown of their head, so you find many men who suffer from baldness looking for ways to regrow hair or even transplant it. Since this vision is one of the terrifying dreams for its owner, let us learn about its meaning in detail through today’s encyclopedia article. Interpretation of baldness in a dream by Ibn Sirin Social life. Also, baldness in a dream indicates a great loss that the dreamer is suffering from in reality, God forbid, and he should be very careful. The dreamer feeling sad in his dream as a result of baldness is a sign that he will go through many crises in the coming period and he must be patient in dealing with them. Although baldness in a dream is often evidence of the harm that the dreamer will suffer, in some cases it is a sign of great good, especially if it is located in the front of the head, as it indicates the fulfillment of dreams. And the ability to achieve goals. Likewise, seeing a young boy suffering from baldness is good for its owner because of the great good he achieves in reality, God willing. Since the white color in the dream is a sign of goodness, if baldness is mixed with gray hair in the dream, then this vision is a sign of the ability of insight. Overcoming the crises and pitfalls that he is exposed to in reality. Interpretation of baldness in a dream for a single woman: Seeing baldness for a single girl does not bode well in most cases, because it can be a sign of academic failure that she will suffer from, or even emotional failure. In some cases, this dream is Reflecting the state of tension and pressure that one girl is already suffering from. But if she finds in her dream that there is a bald man in her life, then this is a warning sign that he is engaged to her, and she will live with him in misery. If baldness affects many parts of the unmarried girl’s head, then she should beware of worshiping ; Because she is retarded in it. But if she finds that she is bald and then her hair begins to grow again, then her dream is the good news of good health and marriage to a pious man who treats her kindly. Interpretation of baldness in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees that she is bald in a dream, then her dream is evidence that she She suffers from conflicts and problems in her marital life and is unable to overcome them. Sometimes baldness in a married woman’s dream is a sign of the great loss she will suffer in her work. If a married woman finds that she has alopecia in a dream, this is a sign that she has heard bad news, God forbid. Interpretation of baldness In a dream for a pregnant womanContrary to interpretations that often aim for evil, seeing baldness in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of the gender of the fetus, as it indicates that God Almighty will provide for him

title: Interpretation of seeing the name Alaa in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the name Alaa in a dream. Alaa is one of the Arabic names that is mentioned in the Holy Qur’an in many places, especially in Surat Al-Rahman, where it indicates blessings or gifts given by the Creator Almighty. Great for worship. Therefore, when you see the name Alaa in a dream, it is a sign of goodness and abundance of sustenance that falls upon the person at that time, so let us examine with you in detail the vision of the name Alaa in a dream. Different circumstances, both for an unmarried or married girl, as well as for a single and married man, in the following lines. Interpretation of the appearance of the name AlaaThe name Alaa is one of the praiseworthy names that one can see in a dream because it indicates goodness in general. Therefore, when you see an unemployed person... Working in a dream, this is a sign of kindness, and that in the coming days a golden job opportunity awaits him that matches his qualifications and provides him with sufficient sustenance. If he is sick and sees this in a dream, this indicates the goodness that will come and his recovery in the near future and the enjoyment of his health and well-being. If the person He is about to travel and feels alienated and sees the name Alaa in a dream. This is an indication of his feeling of security and adapting to the new life easily. Interpretation of a dream about the name Alaa for a single woman. If an unmarried person sees the name Alaa in a dream, this indicates his desire to marry a good, moral and religious girl who will be better. A wife for him in the future, who will protect his home and create a good family with her. Interpretation of seeing the name Alaa for a married man. If the person is already married and sees him and his wife is pregnant, this indicates that he will give birth to a beautiful girl who will become good offspring later. And if he has not yet been born, this name will be A good sign for him in the coming days. If he is a widower, this may indicate the appearance of a new woman in his life who will compensate him for his deceased wife and balance his loneliness. Interpretation of a dream about the name Alaa for a single woman, but if an unmarried woman sees the name Alaa, this is a sign that a wealthy person has proposed marriage Including, working in a prestigious job and going with him to a better life. If she is married, it shows the happiness and joy she feels with her husband and children, as there is a good Muslim family in society. If she is divorced, this may indicate her return to her ex-husband, and God knows best. .

title: Interpretation of washing the house in a dream. The meaning of washing the house in a dream

preview.html:
Contents: Cleaning the house in a single woman’s dream from dust with a broom with soap and water. Dirty house Cleaning the floor from dirt Cleaning the house floor Interpretation of washing the house in a dream When a single woman, a virgin, a married woman, or a pregnant woman sees herself washing the house with water, if she is happily cleaning the house while feeling comfortable with the spirit in her dream, then she will accept the happiness that is within her. She and her features are in front of everyone, but if she is not satisfied with cleaning and does not feel comfortable, she will go through events in which happiness appears in the form of those around her and not in her. If washing with water is accompanied by cleaning with soap, then happiness is a special matter and for a longer period, and it may last for years if it ends. The woman is cleaning and looks very beautiful. Increasing the closeness between her and her family, sisters, brothers, and parents. However, if the female uses turbid water to clean or a substance that the soul does not accept, such as cleaning with mud or dung, or polluting the ground with colors, then she will face sadness or problems that may be as great as the pollution. If he is in any of them and stops working, he will have a problem for a while and it will pass and after that you will feel good, and if you do not stop and continue washing with polluted water, the period will increase. From sadness and trouble. If the man or young man is the one who washes the house, then cleaning it well means a promotion at work or rapprochement between him and the family. It refers to problems that can only be solved with the help of one's confidence.
YouTube House Wash Vision
